main.title: Checking knowledge of the front-end from the school of programmers HH
main.description:
We invite beginners and front-end developers with little experience who want to learn new things from practitioners who develop services with a multi-million audience.

There is no age limit. To enter the school, you need to know HTML, CSS and JavaScript and have experience in interface development - at least a little.
challenges.title: Challenges
results.title: Results
table.column.title: Title
new.task.title: Add task
new.task.instruction.title: Instruction
new.task.instruction.content:
To correctly add a task, you need:

1. Fill in the description

2. Come up with a description of the task and format it in markdown

3. Solve the problem and provide the solution to the system

4. Prepare templates for HTML, CSS and JS 

5. For a task in JS, write tests in JEST
